description:
go.talks/pkg/present: refactor to remove action template functions

Now the Parse function reads all source files (including included
code files), and the template execution only renders templates.
(Previously, the two stages were confused.)

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.talks

LGTM

It looks like there's still a fair amount of template.HTML abuse, but this CL looks plausible and doesn't seem to make the situation worse.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=4de2599667fd&repo=talks ***

go.talks/pkg/present: refactor to remove action template functions

Now the Parse function reads all source files (including included
code files), and the template execution only renders templates.
(Previously, the two stages were confused.)

R=golang-dev, dsymonds
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/6863049
